urls.title: Trinidad & Tobago - Travel Authorisation
urls.description: 1. Non Nationals who are NOT FULLY VACCINATED will NOT be allowed entry into Trinidad and Tobago at this time. 2. Travellers may begin the Application process 72 hours before arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. 3. All Travellers (including minors) must submit a Negative COVID-19 PCR or Lab Acquired Antigen test result (Home Antigen test results will not be accepted). The test should have been taken no earlier than seventy-two (72) hours prior to arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. Proof of this must be presented

@rorystennett @rorystennett, we are happy to be of service to you. Looking forward to welcoming you on-board!#wearecaribbean!✈️👍

-Kezia

@rorystennett @rorystennett further to your correspondence, we have responded to your direct message. Kindly review at your soonest convenience. 

-Kezia

Jumpstart your travel plans for 2022 with our Cyber Monday Sale! ✈️
Get 15% off* when you book on 29th November via our website or mobile app💻📱
So, where will you be heading? 
Learn more and book here: https://t.co/jQ53QPRlc9
*Conditions apply. 
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/jZGCMCFcXP

@cobhlad Hi @cobhlad, please send us a direct message with your full name, email address, contact number and booking reference.

-Emma

Remember to get to the airport four hours before your flight to give yourself time to navigate the pandemic protocols, security and check-in. For flights during curfew hours you'll need the necessary documentation for transportation to/from airport. #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/ZCv2AiUYbB

data.text:
Happy Thanksgiving Day to our family and friends in the United States of America! This year, we wish you an abundance of blessings and gratitude that stays with you this season and  throughout the coming year.

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/KpFmZJ0LwW

data.text:
Just in time for the holidays, reconnect with the people, places and things you love most. ️Fly nonstop between Kingston and Ft Lauderdale✈️
Plus book cars 🚗 and hotels 🏨 via our website.
View health and safety requirements: https://t.co/AJHsatruHN
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/lJJ4Ndrg0s

Let’s stay safe and remember to practice the 3Ws at all times, so we can get back to the people and places we love the most! ️❤️✈️ 

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/3PxrTulNSd

Hats off to our Pilots and First Officers who are some of the best in the industry, as they go above and beyond to keep us safe in the friendly skies. 

We appreciate you all you do, today and every day 👏✈️❤️

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/To0SopvyZ1
